Name: myxofibrosarcoma
Definition: A sarcoma that arises from the soft tissue and is characterized by the presence of spindle-shaped cells

Name: bladder sarcoma
Definition: A sarcoma and malignant neoplasm of urinary bladder that is located_in the bladder.

Name: paranasal sinus sarcoma
Definition: A sarcoma and malignant tumor of nasal sinuses that is located_in the paranasal sinus.

Name: prostate sarcoma
Definition: A prostate cancer that is located_in the prostate.

Name: clear cell sarcoma
Definition: A sarcoma that is characterized by solid nests and fascicles of tumor cells with clear cytoplasm and prominent nucleoli. It presents as a slow growing mass that especially affects tendons and aponeuroses and it is deeply situated.

Name: spindle cell sarcoma
Definition: A sarcoma that results_in cells that are spindle-shaped. They are usually resistant to radiation therapy.

Name: sarcomatosis
Definition: A sarcoma that results_in the formation of numerous sarcomas or located_in various parts of the body.

Name: obsolete bacterial endocarditis
Definition: A sarcoma that results_in the formation of numerous sarcomas or located_in various parts of the body.

Name: obsolete meningococcal carditis
Definition: A sarcoma that results_in the formation of numerous sarcomas or located_in various parts of the body.
